title:
Please advise to whom I should send articles for publication. (Human interest, activities going on in Brunswick County, etc.. Thank you so much.



Martha Koletar
text:
Dave Ennis is our regional editor who oversees our news coverage in
Brunswick County. dave.ennis@starnesonline.com or 343-2389



For features, our features editor is Burke Speaker

burke.speaker@starnewsonline.com or 343-2366



For items for our Brunswick Neighbors page, you can contact me at
merton.vance@starnewsonline.com or 343-2027
